snippet.title: Shift 87 - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Developer Pixelsplit and publisher Daedalic Entertainment have revealed Shift 87, a new "horror observation" game in which you must find all 66 anomalies before your shift ends, lest you be lost in a void of your own paranoia forever. It's coming to Steam on July 23.

#IGN #Gaming
